Job Title: Business Analyst - Remote

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Brief Description

Zywave is a leading provider of software solutions for the insurance and benefits industry, making it an exciting place to work at the forefront of technology in a growing and dynamic field. As a Business Analyst, you will play a crucial role in utilizing proprietary API-first tools like backend "InsuredApp" and frontend "ClarionDoor Portal" to decompose customer rating models into algorithms, develop dynamic forms selection logic, and accurately map insured data for the generation of policy documents. Additionally, you will construct customer quoting portals, design XML and JSON-based web services, and build dynamically populated insurance documents while collaborating with the project team to meet customer requirements and deadlines. You will also be responsible for analyzing and addressing reported bugs during User Acceptance Testing, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Why Should You Apply?

Business Analysts at Zywave contribute to improving the user experience, helping address customer needs, and ensuring the smooth operation of insurance and benefits software, which can be highly satisfying for those who want their work to have a meaningful impact. Zywave also offers a pathway for career growth, providing an exciting prospect for candidates to advance their careers and take on more responsibilities over time.

Factors for Success:

 College degree and 1-3 years of relevant experience required  Proficiency in Microsoft Excel requiredKnowledge of the commercial insurance industry is a plus Experience with XML, JSON or XSLT is a plusExperience in using web-based software applications or configurable platforms is a plus Strong analytical skills, ability to troubleshoot complex issues and problem solve Self-starter can begin work and manage tasks to timelines on their own Strong ability to meet deadlines and communicate reasonable goals Familiarity with Swagger, Postman or other online documentation and API testing tools a plus

Company Background

Why pick Zywave? Zywave is a cutting edge, web-based SaaS company that has revolutionized the insurance industry by helping independent agencies leverage technology solutions to grow their business in employee benefits and property and casualty markets. Zywave has been a highly profitable and growing business for over 25 years and is consistently voted a Top Workplace, also earning an award for Work/Life Balance.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
